<title level="1" pfs="">[Dancer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3569)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dance can be used to tell stories, share emotions, provide entertainment, and display a performer's athletic ability.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Dancer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3569)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 124

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +6, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +6, [Theater Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Dance Specialist** For encounters involving contests of dancing, the dancer is a 5thlevel challenge.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (3), jewelry and clothes (worth 10 gp)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Fascinating Dance** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The dancer Strides up to their Speed. Once during this movement, when the dancer is adjacent to a creature, the dancer can attempt to mesmerize that creature, who attempts a DC 17 Will save. On a failure, that creature is [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=72) with the dancer until the end of its next turn.

</column>
